dcterms:description: ERA5 is a global atmospheric reanalysis dataset providing hourly estimates of various atmospheric, land, and oceanic climate variables from 1940 to present, with a spatial resolution of approximately 30 km.
dcterms:title: ERA5

dcterms:description: CERRA is a high-resolution regional reanalysis dataset for Europe, providing sub-daily data on single levels from 1984 to present, with a spatial resolution of approximately 5.5 km.
dcterms:title: CERRA

dcterms:creator: I. Durre
X. Yin
R.S. Vose

J. Arnfield
B. Korzeniewski
B. Hundermark
dcterms:description: IGRA V2 is a comprehensive collection of global radiosonde profiles, providing temperature, humidity, and wind measurements for validation purposes.
dcterms:title: IGRA V2
